card.name: Holy Awe
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.

card.name: Alphadios, Lord of Spirits
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Angel Commands. ■ Players can't summon creatures other than light creatures or cast spells other than light spells. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Terror Pit
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Bronze-Arm Tribe
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Natural Snare
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.

card.name: Alcadeias, Lord of Spirits
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Angel Commands. ■ Double Breaker ■ Players can't cast spells other than light spells.

card.name: Überdragon Bajula
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your creatures that has Dragon in its race. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose up to 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent puts those cards into his graveyard. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Bolmeteus Steel Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into his graveyard instead.

card.name: Syrius, Firmament Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Aqua Surfer
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Cocco Lupia
card.text: ■ Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 2 less to summon. ''(Dragonoids don't count.)'' They can't cost less than 2.

card.name: Energy Stream
card.text: ■ Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Energy Stream
card.text: ■ Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Faerie Life
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Magmadragon Jagalzor
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Turbo Rush

card.name: Skysword, the Savage Vizier
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

card.name: Stronghold of Lightning and Flame
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less. Then you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Hell's Scrapper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less.

card.name: Heaven's Gate
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand to the battle zone.

card.name: Super Dragon Machine Dolzark
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Whenever one of your other creatures that has Dragon in its race attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that has power 5000 or less and put it into his mana zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Velyrika Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take an Armored Dragon from your deck, show that Armored Dragon to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Flameburn Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.

card.name: Bolmeteus Sapphire Dragon
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Power Attacker ■ Triple Breaker ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into their graveyard instead.

card.name: Magmadragon Balga Geyser
card.text: ■ Power Attacker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Dragon, put it into the battle zone. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

card.name: Terradragon Geobreed
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone that has the lowest power and put into its owner's mana zone. If there's a tie, choose one of them.

card.name: Titan Giant
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone. Then return up to 2 creatures from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Pikarie, Radiance Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Ur, Cleansing Elemental
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, tap or untap a creature in the battle zone.

card.name: Call for Dragons
card.text: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone tapped. If it's a Dragon, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone tapped.
